title: Preparing pixel 3 for Android update
content:
What needs to be done with a pixel 3 before updating to a new Android version?

My first pixel 3 downloaded an update from Android 9 to 10 but would not reboot to a working phone - and could not access Recovery mode.

Phone has been replaced with a refurbished device and I am informed that the device is now out of date.

Don't want to end up with a second pixel 3 that could also end up non-functional.

Any hints on clearing memory or some other procedure before I allow the update to download?
